1: In the first open view of the playroom. It is coloured blue.

3: In the first shot of the playroom, on the bottom left. It is coloured blue.
4: Next to the plush seat in the Playroom. It is coloured blue.

6: Behind a bush, when Bingo is running to the Backyard. It is coloured green.

21: On top of a bush with some rocks, on the left of the Picnic. It is coloured grey blue.

36: Inside of the backyard warehouse, in the foreground next to the wheel. It is coloured light brown.

39: On top of a shelf in the Playroom. It is coloured blue with wavy ears. It can be seen when Bingo, Bluey, and Muffin walk into the restaurant and again to the right of Chilli as she says "known for our speedy service".

25: In the episode we can see Snickers.

37: On the left from the Moonlight Unicorns section with a stack of toys, on top of a big green egg. It is coloured cyan.

On Bluey’s Bedroom balcony, behind Frisky. There are actually two dogs, they look like a Couple.

41: In Chloe’s house, in the aquarium. It has a fish colour pattern, like a Fish dog.
42: In the front of Doreen’s house, behind a bush. It is coloured green. It is only seen on the second night.
43: When the Muffin seed hatch, on the bottom right of the sprout field. It is coloured Leafy Green and has a Cone.

46: On the bottom left of Grey Nomads car back. It is a Car Sticker dog.

51: When Bluey brings Bartleby to the kitchen with Chris and Trixie, behind the microwave. It's brown and it's wearing a Christmas Hat.
52: When Bluey and Bingo get in on the Kitchen balcony, on the side of a green bag. It is white with coloured spots wearing a bunny hat.

02: In the new bedroom, when Bluey is moving the rug in, below the chair. It has a tuft of hair and is coloured brown.

07: Close to the crocodile plush in the Playroom. It is yellow with blue dots.

22: Below the TV stand. It is coloured green.

35: When Chilli is hiding from the girls, on a couch cushion. It is coloured green, like the one from Whale Watching.

When Bingo is threatening Bandit with the basil, beside the fridge, there is a brown dog under a box with an eye patch. This is probably a reference to a character from the video game series Metal Gear Solid, Solid Snake.
The Magnet dog can also be seen on the fridge door.
36: In Wendy's bathroom, behind the bathtub. It is grey with a green nose and much Hair.
37: In Lucky’s house, on top of a brown plushy on a toy basket. It is coloured brown.

When Bandit starts crawling through the cubby. It is in the first room and is coloured blue.

After the collapse of the play house, behind Bluey's tail and under two yellow cushions. It is yellow.

39: In the toy bin at Bandit's doctor's office. It is purple.

42: On top of the painted traffic signal box in front of Stafford State School (just after they leave the cemetery). It's Light Green.

When Chilli is almost catching up to Frisky's car, on a green painted wall.
